info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.api

Class DonationApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.api.DonationApi

  • @Path(value="/donation")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class DonationApi
extends Object
    A donation stands for a real world purpose. This could be for example a real donation for a charitable purpose or an event for the organisationâ€™s employees like the arrangement for the company party or purchasing a new coffee machine. When a donation is created, players can pool coins for a certain amount and the connected purpose if she/he has enough coins. If the required amount is reached, the goal is reached and the purpose can be implemented by the responsible manager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DonationApi

        public DonationApi()

    • Method Detail

      • createDonationCall

        @POST
 @Path(value="/")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createDonationCall(@QueryParam(value="name") @NotNull
                                                                              String name,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="description")
                                                                              String description,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="goalAmount") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit
                                                                              String goalAmount,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                              String apiKey)
        Creates a new call for donations and generates the DonationCall-id. The organisation's API key is mandatory otherwise a warning with the hint for a non valid API key is returned. By the creation the name and description are passed who should be assigned to this call for donation. The goal of the call for donations also has be specified. This goal repesents the amount of coins that should be reached.
        Parameters:
        name - The short name of the call for donation.
        description - The longer description of the call for donation. This can contain its purpose.
        goalAmount - The amount of coins that should be reached to fulfil this donation.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of DonationCall in JSON.

      • donate

        @POST
 @Path(value="/{id}/donate/{playerId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response donate(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The donation id must be a valid number")
                                                                                        String dId,
                                                                                        @PathParam(value="playerId") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The player id must be a valid number")
                                                                                        String playerId,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="amount") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The amount must be a valid number")
                                                                                        String amount,
                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                        String apiKey)
        With this method a player donates a specific amount of coins if she/he has enough coins and the given amount hasn't been already reached. These coins are subtracted from the player's current account and will be added to the DonationCall's current amount. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned. It is also checked, if the id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        dId - The id of the call for donations to which a player donates. This path parameter is required.
        playerId - The id of the player who donates. This path parameter is required.
        amount - The amount of coins which the player donates.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        A Response of DonationCall in JSON.

      • getDonationCall

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDonationCall(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit
                                                                              String dId,
                                                                              @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                              String apiKey)
        Returns the call for donation which is associated with the passed id. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned. It is also checked, if the id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        dId - Required path parameter as integer which uniquely identify the DonationCall.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of DonationCall in JSON.

      • getDonationCalls

        @GET
 @Path(value="/*")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDonationCalls(@QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                            String apiKey)
        Returns the call for donation which are associated with the organisation. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of List with all DonationCalls of one organisaiton in JSON.

      • getProgess

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{id}/progress")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getProgess(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit
                                                                                  String dId,
                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                  String apiKey)
        Returns the progress of an call for donations: the current amount and the amount that should be reached. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned. It is also checked, if the id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        dId - Required path parameter as integer which uniquely identify the DonationCall.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Returns the current amount and the amount that should be reached in JSON.

      • getDonors

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{id}/donors")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDonors(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit
                                                                               String dId,
                                                                               @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                               String apiKey)
        Returns a list of all donors that have donated to a specific call for donoation. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned. It is also checked, if the id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        dId - The id of the call for donations to which all donors should be returned.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Returns a list of all donors of a specific call for donations in JSON.

      • getDonations

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{id}/donations")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDonations(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit(message="The id must be a valid number")
                                                                                     String donationCallId,
                                                                                     @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                     String apiKey)
        Gets a list of all donations which were made for a specific call for donations. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned. It is also checked, if the offer id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        donationCallId - The call for Donation whose donations are returned. This parameter is required.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which the call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response as List of Donations in JSON.

      • changeAttributes

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{id}/attributes")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response changeAttributes(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit
                                                                                          String id,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="attribute")
                                                                                          String attribute,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="value")
                                                                                          String value,
                                                                                          @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                          String apiKey)
        With this method the fields of one specific call for donations can be changed. For this the associated id, the API key of the specific organisation, the name of the field and the new field's value are needed. To modify the name or the description of a call for donation, the new value can be passed. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned. It is also checked, if the id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Required integer which uniquely identify the DonationCall.
        attribute - The name of the attribute which should be modified. This parameter is required. The following names of attributes can be used to change the associated field: "name" and "description"
        value - The new value of the attribute. This parameter is required.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of DonationCall in JSON.

      • deleteDonationCall

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteDonationCall(@PathParam(value="id") @NotNull @ValidPositiveDigit
                                                                                    String id,
                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="apiKey") @ValidApiKey
                                                                                    String apiKey)
        Removes the call for donations with the assigned id from data base. If the goal of call for donations isn't reached, first all donors get their donations back and then in a second step the call for donation itself is removed from the database. Else if the goal is already reached, the call for donation is deleted. It is checked, if the passed id is a positive number otherwise a message for an invalid number is returned. If the API key is not valid an analogous message is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - Required path parameter as integer which uniquely identify the DonationCall that should be deleted.
        apiKey - The valid query parameter API key affiliated to one specific organisation, to which this call for donations belongs to.
        Returns:
        Response of DonationCall in JSON.
